content:
The total fighting loss of the enemy from 24.02.22 to 01.04.24 were:

  • personnel - about 442 880 (+710) persons liquidated
  • tanks - 6986 (+20)
  • combat armored vehicles - 13 321 (+17)
  • artillery systems - 11 082 (+32)
  • RSWW - 1023 (+0)
  • air defense facilities - 744 (+1)
  • aircraft - 347 (+0)
  • helicopters - 325 (+0) units,
  • UAV Operative-tactical level-8757 (+26)
  • Winged missiles - 2057 (+9)
  • ships /boats - 26 (+0)
  • submarines - 1 (+0)
  • automobile equipment and tanks - 14 752 (+35)
  • Special Technique - 1826 (+3)

Data are clarified ...

Beat the occupier! Let's win together! Our strength is in truth!

Source:The General Staff of the Armed Forces of UkraineAs of 01.04.24.
title: Enemy loss per day: over 700 invaders, tanks, BBM and Artsystem
author: Army Inform
